contentrichtext.text: '''NTP''' is a three-letter initialism which may stand for: ==Computing== * [[Network Time Protocol]], a means of synchronizing clocks over a computer network ==Politics== * [[Nation Transformation Party]], a political party in Papua New Guinea * [[National Toxicology Program]], part of the United States Department of Health and Human Services * [[National Transport Plan]], a ten-year plan of Norway * [[Ninh Thuan Province]], a province in Vietnam * [[Northern Territory Police]], the police force in the Northern Territory of Australia ==Science== ===Chemistry=== * [[Normal temperature and pressure]], in chemistry * [[Nucleoside triphosphate]], an organic compound and building block of nucleic acids ===Medicine=== * [[Nortriptyline]], an anti-depressant drug ==Other uses== * Natural Terminal Port, an Australian term referring to pricing of commodities roughly comparable to [[Ex Works]] at the nearest port or railway station * [[New Teacher Project]], a US non-profit organization * [[NTP, Inc.]], an American patent holding firm that threatened to shut down the Blackberry system for patent infringement * [[Nicole Teresa Pauley]], an American businesswoman {{disambig}}
